column2:
"Ta-dah! Pati here, with the freshest intel in
ARKS! Get the buzz for a bargain, right here!"
"Tia here."

"Do you know about these amazing ops? Hm?
What makes them amazing? The fact that they're
so awesome!"

"If I may translate from idiot, she's referring to the
six operatives who hold absolute authority within
the ARKS organization: the Six Pillars."

"Yeah, them! And I totally saw one in person!
Probably! I think!"

"It was hard to tell, with all the explosions and
stuff. Which were AWESOME!"

"As usual, I recommend you disregard anything she says.
We were too far away to see very much."

"That said, it was clear enough that this op was
ridiculously powerful. If they're all like her, I can
see why they get the fancy title."

"But she just looked like your average girl!
She was on the small side, even!"

"I wonder if that means I could be like that, too,
if I tried really, really hard!"
"No."

"はーい！
アークスいちの情報屋
パティちゃんでーす！"
"ティアです。"

"すっごいアークスって知ってる？
何がすごいって？　とにかく
なにもかもがすっごいの！"

"翻訳すると、アークスの中で
絶対命令権を持つ六人。
『六芒均衡』のこと。"

"そうそれ！　あたしこの前
生で見ちゃったっぽいんだよね！"

"なんかもー、どかーん！　ずばーん！
って感じで、すごかったよー！"

"見たと言っても遠目にだから
参考にしないでね。"

"でも、図抜けた力は本当みたい。
仰々しい名前をつけるだけは
あるってことね。"

"どこから見ても普通っぽい
ちいさな女の子だったのに
すっごいよねー！"

"あたしも頑張れば
あんなふうになれるのかなぁ！"
"絶対無理。"
